prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has a round body and large expressive eyes.
Imagine a playful aquatic creature that loves to splash around in rivers.
Show me a tiny blue Pokemon with a spiral belly and webbed feet.
Generate a cute Pokemon that evolves into a more powerful water creature.
Design a small, friendly Pokemon that loves playing in the wetlands.
Give me a Pokemon that can swim fast and has a cheerful personality.
Make a whimsical character that embodies the joy of water play.
